Rule #4 for solving urban problems w/tech & data: Borrow good ideas from others.  Not every solution needs to be original. (5/5)
Rule #3 for solving urban problems w/tech & data: You need to spend money to save money (4/5)
Rule #2 for solving urban problems w/tech & data: Be agnostic about public vs. private sector solutions. (3/5)
Rule #1 for solving urban problems w/tech & data: Solutions to mundane problems can have the biggest impact. (2/5)
